Text: Specially uploaded for following "The Language of Hollywood: Storytelling, Sound, and Color" course at Coursera.
The quality is not the best, but it's enough. It's not with spanish subtitles, the intertitles are dubbed in spanish...
Thanks a lot for uploading!! Huge help for following the course!!
